title: Halo Party Fri 1st may (or sat 2nd depending on where you live)
content:
hey all, just a quick invite to a halo party on Friday the 1st of may at about 9pm.

for those of us not on the west coast of united states, here is the times: [http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/meetingtime.html?month=5&day=2&yea...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120731034241/http:/www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/meetingtime.html?month=5&day=2&year=2009&p1=152&p2=224&p3=-1&p4=-1&iv=0 "http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/meetingtime.html?month=5&day=2&year=2009&p1=152&p2=224&p3=-1&p4=-1&iv=0")

you can find me by looking for armorath on xbox live.

cheers
author: Simon Robertson

comments.content: I can make it if you are saying Friday 9pm, PST (my time). Otherwise, that is early morning and I'm working :(
Awesome. If I'm awake and there isn't a hockey game on I'll be there.

yep, zara that's friday your time, i figured most people were from your neck of the woods...

@okokokokokokokokokok cool! hopefully see you there!
